resources.string: "There is currently no Facebook cover image.\nSelect cover image by clicking one of the general images."
"The project has not been saved to your cart.\nGo to the details page\nwithout saving?"
"Please include your account name when making enquiries,\nto help us better assist you."
"News and events will be\nnotified through the push alarm."
"We analyse your photo and automatically\nmake product recommendations for you."
"Tap and drag photos to change the order."
"The selected photo size is too small for use. How about choosing another photo?"
"The selected photo resolution is too small.\n resulting in poor print quality.\nHow about choosing another photo?"
"Please note when making an order for a photo uploaded on SNS such as Kakaostory/Facebook/Instagram, deleting or making it private may cause the order to not be processed."
"An unexpected error as occurred\nand the upload has been cancelled. \nPlease make the order again."
"Networing connection is unstable.\nPlease check your network connection."
"If retry does not work, please cancel\nthen start the order again."
"It may take longer depending on network connection."
"Data usage during upload may incur additional charges."
"Photos that cannot be printed on the selected size has been removed."
"Coupon and delivery info will be sent via e-mail, so please enter your correct e-mail address."
"Agree to the Terms of Use and Personal Information Collection and Usage Agreement."
"If you cannot check your e-mail, please contact customer service by e-mailing 'snaps@snaps.kr'."
"A temporary password has been sent to the registered e-mail address."
"Please remember to change your password after logging in."
"Please enter a new password.\n(English letters and numbers only)"
"Thank you for using Snaps.\nWe will try our best to provide the best service possible."
"All Snaps coupons and Snaps Money will be terminated."
"Your personal information (name, e-mail etc.) that can identify the subject of the trade will be stored for a period of time according to the [Electronic commerce consumer protection law]."
"Order and trade details and data currently being edited will all be deleted and cannot be restored."
"For the safety of your information,\nplease enter the password again."
"It may take long to construct\ndepending on the amount of data of posts and photos for the selected period.\nAn alert will be sent once it is complete."
"(Please check if you have alerts on.)"

"1.Sender : Snaps
2.Receive alert date : %1$s
3.Processed content : %2$s
You can always change the settings at Settings > Alert Settings."

"1.Sender : Between
2.Receive alert date : %1$s
3.Processed content : %2$s
You can always change the settings at Settings > Alert Settings."
"The project has not been saved to your cart.\nGo to the details page\nwithout saving?"
"The print quality is poor.\nPlease choose another photo!"
"Cannot load template data.\nPlease check your network connection then try again."
"Click here to see your Kakaostory Book. Don't forget to save it to your cart after taking a look~"
"Oh! The maximum page limit (401P) has been exceeded!\nThe time period has been changed accordingly.\nPlease check the modified period before making your order."

"Not enough posts to create a photobook.
The minimum number of pages required is 21P.
Please extend the period or
select additional options."
"No posts have been made within the selected period.\nPlease check the period then try again."
"Click here to see your Facebook Photobook. Don't forget to save it to your cart after taking a look~"
"Save complete.\nThe product can be found\nin your cart."
"Click here to see your Instagram Book."
"Click here to see your Instagram Book. Don't forget to save it to your cart after taking a look~"

"Not enough photos to create a Instagram Book.
The minimum number of pages required is 21P.
Please extend the period or
select additional options."
"No photos exist within the selected period.\nPlease check the period then try again."
"No stories exist within the selected period.\nPlease check the period then try again."
"An error has occurred while loading your Story account info\nPlease check your network status then try again."
"An error has occurred while loading your Story Book list.\nPlease check your network status then try again."
"An error has occurred while loading your Story Book info\nPlease check your network status then try again."

"Not enough stories to create a Kakao Book.
The minimum number of pages required is 21P.
Please extend the period or
select additional options."
"An error has occurred while creating the photobook\nand may have caused a loss in edited data.\nPlease check your alterations before making the order."
"An error has occurred while reading the file\nand may have caused a loss in edited data.\nPlease check your alterations before making the order."
"Failed to save due to unstable network connection or insufficient memory. Please check then try again."
"It will first be saved to the cart, then shared through Kakaotalk."
"Project created through Snaps has been shared.\n\nGo check out %1$s's project now."
"This product has already been ordered.\nIt cannot be saved."
"Delete the photo and go to the previous page."
"Failed to load product price. Please try again later."
"Failed to load data. Please try again later."
"Your account has been cleared\nof the dormancy status."
"You have already participated in the installation event. You can only participate with one account on the same device."
"Could not load menu due to temporary network problem.\nPlease restart the App."
"Could not log in due to network problems.\nPlease try again."
"The entered user ID does not exist,\nor an incorrect ID or password has been entered."
"Press once more to quit the App."
"Notifies you of various benefits\nsuch as Snaps special sale and events,\n as well as personalized surprise coupons."
"A new Snaps APP version is available!\nPlease update now."
"Failed to verify version data.\nPlease try again later!"
"Password must be between 6~15 English letters and numbers."
"A deleted account cannot be used again.Please use a different e-mail (ID)."
"The same e-mail (ID) is already in use. Please use a different e-mail (ID)."
"Reset the selected photo and return to previous page."
"Facebook is temporarily unavailable.\nSorry for the inconvenience."
"Instagram photos is temporarily unavailable.\nSorry for the inconvenience."
"Cannot select any more photos.\nFirst put the photos into your cart then select the photos again."
"Please allow access to your photos for the product to be created. Select access rights, then change data storage access to ON."
"The photo has exceeded the print area limit."
"Coupon has been sent.\nPlease check your Manage Coupons.\n"
"(Expiry date : 1 week from date of issue)"
"Cannot participate in event.\nThe same ID cannot be used to participate in this event."
"Cannot participate in event.\nCannot participate in a previously installed device."
"Cannot logout while uploading photo. Please try again after the upload is finished."
"Failed to load image.\nPlease try again later."
"Reset the data currently being edited, and go to the photo selection page?"
"No posts exist for the selected period."
"No story exist for the selected period."
"The print quality for the selected photo is\npoor.\nPlease choose another photo!"
"Additional pages will incur extra costs.\nAdd more pages?"
"If you choose the layout with photo, you can delete it."
"Not enough photos have been selected to fill the package.\nGo to the edit page?"
"A backbone has been added to the cover. The title you enter will be printed on the backbone."
"%d is a basic page and cannot be deleted."
"Do you want to leave this page without\nsaving the currently edited product?"
"Do you want to leave this page without\nsaving the currently edited product?"
"Do you want to leave this page without\nsaving the currently edited product?"
"An error has occurred while adding pages."
"An error has occurred while refreshing the screen."
"Emoticons and abnormal letters will be removed from the text."
"Image being saved.\nPlease wait for a moment."
"Emoticon in images will be shown on the screen\nbut will not be printed, so please only enter text."
"Enter a title for your personal Facebook Book"
"Please check the coupon number then try again."
"This code has either been rejected or has expired."
"Exceeded the limit of coupons that can be registered."
"This partnership coupon cannot be registered currently."
"The account will be deleted for all Snaps, APP, and website."
"Pages will be created automatically in the order of Facebook dates."
"Coupon cannot be combined with other discount and will be Applied to the regular price."
"Certain coupons may be only Applied on PC or mobile. "
"Each coupon has an expiration date and can no longer be used after the expiry date."
"Coupon can be used at the stage of [Apply Coupon] of Order/Payment."
"Request failed due to unstable network. Please try again later."
"스냅스 일기를 만들기 위해 최소 20개의 일기가 필요합니다. 일기를 더 작성해 주세요!\n현재 일기 수 : %d개"
"An error occurred while the product was being created.\nPlease try again. Please contact the customer service center if the problem persists."
"An error occurred while the page thumbnail was being created.\nPlease try again. Contact the customer service center if the problem persists."
"An error occurred while the representative image was being created.\nPlease try again. Contact the customer service center if the problem persists."
"An error occurred while the image was being created.\nPlease try again. Contact the customer service center if the problem persists."
"An error occurred while uploading.\nPlease try again. Contact the customer service center if the problem persists.\n(%s)"
"An error occurred while uploading.\nPlease try again. Contact the customer service center if the problem persists."
"Click here to see your Snaps Diary. Don't forget to save it to your cart after taking a look~"
"Shared project can be ordered from the cart"
"For members not using an e-mail ID\nplease contact customer service at 1577-4701."
"Login using the Snaps ID %s@\nto use all our services"
"The upload will be terminated.\nPlease restart the App."
"Unstable network may cause the\nupload to fail."
"The selected photo cannot be used for the order.\nPlease try again."
"Card company's authorization certificate APP is not installed.\nTap the install button on the page."
"Card company's Usim App is not installed.\nTap the install button on the page."

"[Snaps]
Print photo/Photobook/Kakao Storybook
Snaps APP ranked 1st on Googleplay!

Not only print the photos on your phone, but use them to make photobooks, calendars, photo frames, mobile cases and other photo products to cherish your memories!"
"To use the photos on your phone,\ngo to [Iphone Settings] menu > [Snaps APP] >\nSnaps Access > [Use Photo] and allow access to the photos."
"Not enough photos have been selected to fill the package.\nInsert photos to all empty spaces\nthen save."

"Snaps App alert has been
set to OFF.
Change the iPhone settings to allow alerts
then try again"
"Text that has exceeded the character limit and have crossed past the print area has been deleted."
"The Application was not properly executed. Please run it again."
"There is not enough space left on the equipment to run APP. \nSecure at least 200 MB of free space."
"스냅스 일기를 만들기 위해 최소 20개의 일기가 필요합니다. 일기를 더 작성해 주세요!\n현재 일기 수 : %1$d개\n(%2$s에서 작성한 일기는 제외 됩니다.)"
"You've got unprintable photos.Please save them after edit."
"Uppercase letters and spaces cannot be entered. Please enter again."
"The email address you entered does not match."
"Please agree to the terms and conditions."
"Word spacing and upper case in email address are not allowed. Please enter again."

"25 letters excepting special characters are allowed for the title of cover. And, the text will not be printed if you don't enter the title. For soft cover, it is only possible to print at least 76P."
"Connection is being delayed due to network problem."
"Login failure due to surge in users at the moment. Please try again later."
"Some edited contents are initialized due to saved edit info problem. Please try again."
"There are modifications. Are you sure you want to exit?"
"Do you want to move to the page?(Your edit will not be saved)"
"Please check the start and end dates."
"Downloading the necessary info for App activation."
"Extra charges may incur if downloading via data network."
"Word spacing is not allowed. Please try again."
"Zoom in or out with two fingers."
"Resize images to fit on photo paper"
"Touch to enter text. (Corresponding text will not be printed.)"
"Do you want to go to the list page without saving the edits?"
"Option not applied.\nPlease tap the [Apply all] button"
"Image alignment can be printed without fading, but margins are created."
"The photo paper fit is printed to fit the photo size without margins."
"Apply a border to all photos.\nThe thickness of the border is 5mm."
"Cancels the correction applied to all pictures."
"Put the shooting date information on all pictures."
"When selecting photos, you can set the print area."
"If language changed, the exisitng cart saved in previous language will not be seen in newly changed language.\nIf you want to see the exsiting cart, please set the language into previous one."
"This picture can not be used. \n Please change the photo."
"Every photo will be printed on glossy paper."
"Every photo will be printed on matt paper."
"Some uploading of photos failed. \nPlease change to another photo."
"I can not connect to the network. \nCheck the network connection status."
"Deleting the failed photo and saving to the cart is completed. \nPlease check the photo on your cart and order."
"Storage capacity is insufficient. \nSecure at least 100MB of free space."
"Once connected with google account, \n you can create and enjoy our various products."
"Your google authentication token has expired.\nPlease log in again."
"An error occurred while saving the project. (Project code issue error) \n Please recreate the product when the same error occurs."
"An error occurred while saving the project. \n Please recreate the product when the same error occurs."
"An error occurred while saving the project. \n Please recreate the product when the same error occurs."
"An error occurred while saving the project. \n Please recreate the product when the same error occurs."
"An error occurred while saving the project. \n Please recreate the product when the same error occurs."
"Could not set project save path. \nPlease try again."
"Your permission settings are complete. \nPlease continue your order."
"One setting has been canceled. \nYou need access to the store to proceed with the order. \nPlease check and try again."
"Network is not connected. Turn off and on Wifi, then, upload again if internet works normally."
"After returning to the Snapshots diary, change the photo of the diary to another photo, and then \nrepeat it again."
"Touch to enter the contents of the card. \n (If you don't enter anything, nothing will be printed.)"
"You can delete it by long tap."
"This photo is not available due to its small size. Please choose another photo."
"The quantity of photo cards is less than full.(total quantity:24pcs)Add to cart?"
"There is a blank photo area. Add to cart?"
"Touch to enter the contents. \n (If you don't enter anything, nothing will be printed.)"
"Due to low resolution of the photo, printing quality would not be good."
"Due to low resolution of the photo, printing quality would not be good."
"The paper option you selected is not changeable during editing. \nDo you want to create a photo card?"
"Due to low resolution of the photo, printing quality would not be good. Recommending add other photo."
"Due to low resolution of the photo, printing quality would not be good."
"Package colors will be sent randomly. \n (Pink, Yellow, Blue, Orange, Green, Black)"
"You can no longer select photos. \n (1 photo is printed as %d)"
"If the photo is selected, it is contained in here."
"Use two fingers to enlarge or shrink the photo.\n You can see the photos in a larger size or larger numbers."
"You can add the photos while looking at them enlarged."
"You can see the photo in a larger size after enlarging it with two fingers."
"You can change the cover and title."
"You can see it in full screen in advance."
"You can drag and move it to the desired location."
"You can continue editing after saving it in your cart."
"Touch the post you wish to remove."
"Touch the diary you wish to remove."
"You can set the area to print by touching the photo."
"You can write text on the back."
"You can make it in different colors."
"For easy creation, the cover page only image editing function is provided."
"Touch the story you wish to remove."
"Data usage during upload may incur additional charges.\nDo you want to proceed?"
"이용에 불편 드려 죄송합니다.\nBIZ회원 로그인은 준비 중입니다.\n스냅스 웹으로 이용 부탁드립니다."
"There's a change in the design of inner card.\nYou must edit and save it before you can order."
"A new Snaps APP version is available!\nPlease update now.\n(Please refresh the update page in the app store.)"
"The quantity of sticker is less than full.(total quantity:5pcs)\n Add to cart?"
"The quantity of sticker is less than full.(total quantity:7pcs)\n Add to cart?"
"The quantity of sticker is less than full.(total quantity:17pcs)\n Add to cart?"
"Do you want to leave this page without\nsaving the currently edited product?"
"선택된 사진에 따라 페이지가 추가되었습니다.\n(추가된 페이지: %1$dP / 총 가격: %2$s)"
"Please update to the latest version\nfrom the App Store."
"Do you want to leave this page without\nsaving the currently edited product?"
"Your permission settings are complete. \nPlease try again for a smooth progress."
"Text is not displayed because of network problems.\nPlease try again."
"Check text area.\nMade in the form you entered."
"Initialize your entry \n and go to the previous page."
"The quantity of poster is less than full.(total quantity:5pcs)\n Add to cart?"
"The quantity of poster is less than full.(total quantity:3pcs)\n Add to cart?"
"The quantity of sticker is less than full.(total quantity:10pcs)\n Add to cart?"
"The last image at the back will be printed on\nthe reverse of the first image at the front."
"The last image at the front will be printed on\nthe reverse of the first image at the back."
"The quantity of sticker is less than full.(total quantity:%spcs)\n Add to cart?"
"The quantity of Paper slogans is less than full.(total quantity:%spcs)\n Add to cart?"
"You have exceeded the number of selections. Pictures that are exceeded are excluded.(Maximum %snumber)"
"Added up to the maximum number of pages that can be produced. Pictures that are exceeded are excluded."
"Drag and drop the picture you want to change."
"Try pressing and holding for more than 3 seconds to activate drag mode.\nYou can select multiple chapters at once."
"The quantity of sticker is less than full.(total quantity:3pcs)\n Add to cart?"
"You can correct it by touching the font box."
"Did you check the name sticker text carefully?\nTouch Save to save to cart."
"Some pictures have been deleted due to change.\nSave this to your cart?"
"Only the English letters, numbers and special characters are allowed"
"ID that has not logged in for more than one year\nfor privacy is converted to dormant account."
"The personal information and service usage information\nof dormant members is deleted except for mandatory items that\nare kept under law."
"No photos selected.\nGo to the edit page?"
"Areas without backgrounds are made transparent\nand image areas are not transparent."
"•책등과 표지에 들어갈 제목을 입력해주세요.\n•특수문자를 제외한 25자리까지 입력이 가능해요.\n•제목은 편집기에서 언제든 바꿀 수 있어요."
"Google Photos is temporarily unavailable.\nSorry for the inconvenience."
"Snaps Would Like to Send You Notifications"
"Notifications may include alerts, sounds, and icon badges. \nThese can be configured in Settings."
"The print quality is poor.\nPlease choose another photo!"
"Please change the language, if you want to open this page. Thank you."
"등록된 이미지가 하나로 연결되어 있지 않습니다.\n이미지를 편집 (떨어져 있는 부분 제거) 한 후 다시 등록해주세요."

아크릴 키링으로 만들 수 있는
최소 사이즈 (10mm)보다 작아집니다.
이미지의 사이즈와 비율을 확인하고
다시 등록해주세요.

아크릴 스탠드로 만들 수 있는
최소 사이즈 (20mm)보다 작아집니다.
이미지의 사이즈와 비율을 확인하고
다시 등록해주세요.
Saved cropped image\nin the photo album
편집중인 상품을 저장하지 않고\n이전 페이지로 이동하시겠습니까?
장바구니로 이동 시 가져운 사진 중 포토북에\n사용하지 않은 사진은 저장되지 않습니다.
"모바일 데이터 사용 시\n데이터 요금이 과금될 수 있습니다.\n계속 진행하시겠습니까?"
네트워크 연결 상태가 불안정합니다.\n잠시 후 다시 시도해주세요.
